name: Clutch
description: '''Clutch''' is an American [[Rock music|rock]] band from [[Germantown, Maryland]]. Since its formation in 1991, the band lineup has included [[Tim Sult]] (lead guitar), Dan Maines (bass), [[Jean-Paul Gaster]] (drums), and [[Neil Fallon]] (vocals, rhythm guitar, keyboards). To date, Clutch has released thirteen studio albums, and several rarities and live albums. Since 2008, the band has been signed to their own record label, [[Weathermaker Music]]. Clutch is one of the pioneers of [[stoner rock]].
